text: thumb Bohuslav Kokotek (16 June 1949 – 24 July 2016), also known as Bogusław Kokotek, was a Czech Lutheran clergyman, journalist, activist of the Polish minority in the Czech Republic, and local politician. In 1973 he became the ordained minister of the Silesian Evangelical Church of the Augsburg Confession. == References == * Kolasa, Adam: I kněz je docela normální člověk (denik.cz, 31.01.2011) * Ks. Bogusław Kokotek (Zaolzie Teraz, 2012) * Zmarł ks. sen. Bogusław Kokotek (sceav.cz, 25.07.2016) * Zemřel farář Bohuslav Kokotek (ihorizont.cz, 25.07.2016) * Zmarł ks. senior Kokotek (glosludu.cz, 25.07.2016) Category:1949 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Czech politicians Category:Polish people from Zaolzie Category:Comenius University alumni Category:Czech Lutheran clergy Category:Czech journalists Category:Recipients of the Gold Cross of Merit (Poland)
title: Bohuslav Kokotek
